analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x0486506702b47fd838f3b8ead7fc9509f012f4a7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/34/0x0486506702b47fd838f3b8ead7fc9509f012f4a7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x0486506702b47fd838f3b8ead7fc9509f012f4a7.sol#61-63) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of Garrys.weiToOwner (/unique_chucks/34/0x0486506702b47fd838f3b8ead7fc9509f012f4a7.sol) is not in mixedCase
